org.framed.orm.ui.editor

Class EditorChangeNotifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.framed.orm.ui.editor.EditorChangeNotifier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.eclipse.gef.commands.CommandStackEventListener

    public class EditorChangeNotifier
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.eclipse.gef.commands.CommandStackEventListener
    Author:
    paul Builds the subject part of an observer pattern. Listens to events of the command stack and leads them to the registered observers. This class is needed, because Java forbids multi-inheritance... TODO: If there is already an observer without the need to subclass CommandStackEventListener use that one instead of this helper class
